headline: Verizon Strengthens Dividend Reliability with Debt Optimization and 5G Expansion
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is one of the 10 best dividend stocks according to Jim Cramer. Raymond James maintains a Buy rating, following the network slice in more than 20 new markets and an announcement of the initiation of private exchange offers for ten series of its outstanding notes. Headquartered in New York, Verizon Communications […]
